formattedAddress: 90 West St, New York, NY 10006, USA
adrFormatAddress: 90 West St, New York, NY 10006, USA

originalText.text:
From Robert Swan, OBE // Founder, 2041 Foundation

Many years ago I became the first person in history to walk to both the North & South Poles unassisted. My firsthand experiences inspired me to dedicate my life to the Polar Regions, with a special emphasis on the Antarctic. I work closely with the Explorers Passage, in both Regions, to ensure Team Members walk away with an unforgettable and hand-on experience. Together we provide unique and academically stimulating opportunities to visit some of Earth's most remote and at risk regions. Most importantly, we educate and empower to build champions of change. As someone that travels most of the year I have full confidence in Jeff and the Explorers Passage from the logistics and everything in between, even at the Earth's ends...

originalText.text: I participated in Climate Force Arctic 2019. This experience was life-changing. I had an opportunity to learn a lot about climate change and possible solutions from experts in this area and also develop leadership skills during workshops and group projects. The trip was well organised and I was impressed by the ease of communication with TEP prior to the departure. Furthermore, this expedition enabled me to meet amazing people from all around the world, passionate about their work and from whom I have so much to learn. It was an amazing experience!

originalText.text: I joined the last Antarctica expedition. It was certainly one of the best expeditions that I have ever been to. Very professionally managed with a strong focus on raising awareness about sustainability and climate change. The overall learning from this experience has been phenomenal. Highly recommended!

text.text: I joined the last Antarctica expedition. It was certainly one of the best expeditions that I have ever been to. Very professionally managed with a strong focus on raising awareness about sustainability and climate change. The overall learning from this experience has been phenomenal. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: The Explorer's Passage is a wonderful venue to travel with purpose, conscious living, and learn/explore so many remarkable and awe-inspiring places in the world. Traveling with TEP was life altering and truly amazing. Going to the North Pole is not something many can say they've done! TEP did a fantastic job of making sure travel was seamless, questions were answered, and maintained safety first + fun of course.

text.text: The Explorer's Passage is a wonderful venue to travel with purpose, conscious living, and learn/explore so many remarkable and awe-inspiring places in the world. Traveling with TEP was life altering and truly amazing. Going to the North Pole is not something many can say they've done! TEP did a fantastic job of making sure travel was seamless, questions were answered, and maintained safety first + fun of course.

originalText.text: I could not recommend The Explorers Passage highly enough - it is the leading international travel company for adventure with an environmental and social purpose. It was a privilege to participate on The Explorers Passage and 2041 International Antarctic Expedition led by Jeff Bonaldi, Sir Robert Swan (OBE) and Barney Swan. With 90 environmental change-makers from over 20 countries we were inspired by the place we visited - Antarctica, the people we interacted with, and returned to society motivated to contribute. I couldn't recommend The Explorers Passage highly enough.
